name: Fight Game Super Early Alpha 0.5 (In development)
name_original: Fight Game Super Early Alpha 0.5 (In development)
description:
Fight Game (this name will change, i only put this, because i didnt know what name to put lol) its a free, simple fighting game to play alone or with your friends! The game is still in development and the full release will be in the end of March, so stay tuned for more updates, new content will drop, like modes, mechanics, new characters and more :)

If you have some feedback (ideas to the game, bug reports, reviews) feel free to write in the comment section down bellow :)
